description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface declares four pure virtual methods that handle different container-related events, passing a JsonObject reference to each method.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class with virtual methods for handling container lifecycle events (started, stopped, failed, state change), intended to be implemented by event handler classes.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Handles the event when a container starts. Receives a JsonObject containing event data.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Handles the event when a container stops. Receives a JsonObject containing event data.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Handles the event when a container fails. Receives a JsonObject containing event data.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Handles the event when a container changes state. Receives a JsonObject containing event data.
